Shock Trooper Initiate.title: Advanced Assault Specialist

Shock Trooper Initiate.title: Rapid Response Commander
Shock Trooper Initiate.description: Leadership in rapid deployment units and crisis response teams. Specializes in coordinating strike teams under high-pressure situations.

Shock Trooper Initiate.title: Orbital Siege Expert
Shock Trooper Initiate.description: Advanced knowledge in planetary assault operations and siege tactics. Combines expertise in ground-based and orbital combat operations.

Tactical Recon Trainee.description: Oversees long-term reconnaissance operations across hostile or uncharted territories. Expertise in stealth tactics, information analysis, and unit survival.

Tactical Recon Trainee.title: Covert Operations Specialist
Tactical Recon Trainee.description: Specializes in black ops, espionage, and sabotage missions. Trained in silent movement, infiltration, and advanced concealment.

Tactical Recon Trainee.title: Pathfinder Officer
Tactical Recon Trainee.description: Leads exploration teams into unexplored or contested zones. Skilled in terrain analysis, survival, and tactical navigation.

Orbital Drop Specialist.title: Exo-Assault Commander

Orbital Drop Specialist.title: Orbital Strike Planner
Orbital Drop Specialist.description: Designs and leads precision orbital deployment strategies. Integrates fleet coordination with ground-based operational needs.

Orbital Drop Specialist.title: Environmental Adaptation Specialist
Orbital Drop Specialist.description: Expertise in operating in hostile planetary environments post-drop. Combines knowledge of planetary science and combat survival tactics.

Cyberwarfare Operative.title: Cybersecurity Commander

Cyberwarfare Operative.title: Offensive Cyberwar Strategist
Cyberwarfare Operative.description: Designs and executes large-scale cyber attacks on enemy infrastructure. Combines software manipulation and tactical disruption techniques.

Cyberwarfare Operative.title: Tech-Augmented Warfare Expert
Cyberwarfare Operative.description: Develops and deploys cybernetic-enhanced warfare systems. Focuses on integrating cyberwarfare into physical combat operations.

Combat Medic.title: Tactical Field Surgeon

Combat Medic.title: Combat Biohazard Specialist

Combat Medic.title: Enhanced Life Systems Operator

Corporate Operator.title: Corporate Negotiator
Corporate Operator.description: Expert in deal-making, contract negotiation, and leveraging corporate partnerships. Skilled in reading situations and manipulating stakeholders to corporate advantage.

Corporate Operator.title: Operations Overwatch Director
Corporate Operator.description: Oversees multiple operations across various planetary sectors. Focuses on risk management, disaster response, and operational continuity.

Corporate Security Training.title: Corporate Enforcement Commander
Corporate Security Training.description: Leads corporate security teams to protect assets and enforce compliance. Specializes in crowd control, private law enforcement, and suppression tactics.

Corporate Security Training.title: Risk Mitigation Strategist

Corporate Security Training.title: Private Security Architect
Corporate Security Training.description: Oversees the design and deployment of advanced security systems. Combines physical security measures with cutting-edge surveillance and AI defenses.

Corporate Intelligence.title: Strategic Data Analyst
Corporate Intelligence.description: Processes and interprets large datasets to forecast trends and guide corporate policy. Skilled in identifying threats and opportunities within hostile markets.

Corporate Intelligence.title: Covert Acquisition Specialist
Corporate Intelligence.description: Operates in the gray areas of corporate espionage, acquiring competitor secrets and technology. Trained in stealth, deception, and advanced information extraction techniques.

Corporate Intelligence.title: Corporate Shadow Operative
Corporate Intelligence.description: Expert in high-risk intelligence gathering and black ops missions on behalf of corporate interests. Skilled in sabotage, misinformation campaigns, and elimination of key adversaries.
